title: Nunu's balls are bugged
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FaM-xLKj7sw&feature=youtu.be

Nunu's ball started bugging out  from the start of the game. you could walk inside of it and everything

Also we won cause yano {{champion:99}} 

https://gyazo.com/95282fd1bf9348cd61a09fcbcecc395a

replies.body: Reading patch 9.9 notes, the interaction between Draven and Illaoi is not mentioned - I wonder if that is still present.
Nunu balls are also bugged with that knockup from rek sai he disappears from view and reappears a few seconds later. I dont think riot will fix any time soon

It would be interesting to see if the replay showed the same thing or if it was only locally that it was doing that.

Either way, that's one for a bug report (little bug in the bottom right of the client).
